content: अन्वित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Followed or attended by, in company with, joined by; अमात्यपुत्रैः सवयोभिरन्वितः <ls>R. 3. 28.</ls> {@--2@} Possessed of, having, possessing, endowed with; full of, seized or struck with, overpowered by; with <ab>instr.</ab> or in compound; कुलान्वितं कुकुलजा निंदंति <ls>Pt. 1. 415</ls>; धैर्य°; गुण°, वित्त°; विस्मय° struck with wonder; भय°, क्रोध°, लोभ° &c. &c. {@--3@} Connected with, linked to, following (as a consequence). {@--4@} Connected grammatically; वर्णाः पदं प्रयोगार्हानन्वितैकार्थबोधकाः <ls>S. D. 9.</ls> {@--5@} Understood, reached by the mind.
